item.description: Let's meet at the south end of the stadium, which is just off Rocky Hill Road in Amherst. Let's get together at the UMass Stadium grounds to walk the circular track and/or have some playtime with our furry companions. The pathway has been pretty consistently clear and there's lots of room in the fields to run, chase and play! Hopefully the weather will cooperate. You may wish to bring water for yourself and your dog(s). See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Near the standing stones,with a black jacket & black lab with a blue leash

group.name: Western Mass Dogs - Walks and more!

item.name: Snowy Stadium Stroll, UMass, Amherst
